description: The SDD segment contains the attributes of an instance of a cycle that provides sterilization or decontamination of medical supplies.

1.name: Lot Number
1.description: A unique number associated with an instance of a sterilization/decontamination cycle assigned by the instrument-tracking system.

2.name: Device Number
2.description: The number of the device (e.g., 01 VAC).

3.name: Device Name
3.description: The name of the device associated with the device number in SDD-2 (e.g., 01 VAC).

4.name: Device Data State
4.description: The state of data being sent, i.e., historic data of the cycle or a real-time snapshot of the current value of the cycle data. During a sterilization process, data is consistently being output to record the value of the data at each point in time within the instance of a cycle. For example, the temperature is recorded at every point in time during the cycle.
4.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

5.name: Load Status
5.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

6.name: Control Code
6.description: A code to command the device to send cycle data from the previous load to the instrument-tracking system.

7.name: Operator Name
7.description: The person who started the device load for the decontamination/sterilization process.
